title: One Piece Episode #497 Review
author: Unknown
description: A review of Episode 497 that praises the episode for letting the kids' imaginations and child-like nature run wild, calling it a very engaging and almost beautiful series of sequences.

title: Anime Review: One Piece 497-499
author: Population GO
description: A review covering episodes 497-499, noting that Episode 497 was definitely the best of the 7 episodes from the flashback arc and breathed some well-executed comedy that was much needed.

title: 497-498: Leaving the Dadan Family for Good?! The Kids' Hideout Has Been Built! and Luffy Becoming an Apprentice?! A Man Who Fought Against the King of Pirates!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A retrospective blog post analyzing episodes 497-498, discussing the brothers' hideout construction and the filler nature of these episodes.

title: One Piece – Post War Arc (Episodes 493 – 516) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Post-War Arc, including Episode 497. Discusses the arc's pacing and the filler episodes that padded out the flashback sequences.

title: One Piece Episode 497 Reaction
author: Supreme Past
description: Video reaction covering episodes 497-500, showing first-time viewer responses to the ASL brothers' childhood adventures.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 497 REACTION!
author: According to Lucky
description: Recent video reaction to Episode 497, showing a first-time viewer's response to the brothers building their hideout and Dadan's character development.

title: ASL || One Piece Episode 497, 498 & 499 REACTION + REVIEW
author: Unknown
description: Combined reaction and review video covering episodes 497-499, focusing on the ASL brothers' relationship and character dynamics.

title: Episode 497 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 497 containing plot summary, character appearances, production details, trivia, and references.

title: Dadan Ikka to no Wakare!? Kansei! Himitsu Kichi (TV Episode 2011)
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 497 with user ratings (7.8/10), cast information, and user reviews.
